parameter.name: quantityNotShippedByItem
parameter.description: Key is orderItemSeqId, value is quantity not shipped for item.

parameter.name: quantityNotShippedByPart
parameter.description: Key is orderPartSeqId, value is quantity not shipped for all items in part.

parameter.name: quantityNotBilledByItem
parameter.description: Key is orderItemSeqId, value is quantity not billed for item.

parameter.name: totalNotBilledByItem
parameter.description: Key is orderItemSeqId, value is total (quantity * amount) not billed for item.

parameter.name: quantityNotBilledByPart
parameter.description: Key is orderPartSeqId, value is quantity not billed for all items in part.

parameter.name: templateLocation
parameter.description: Looked up from ProductStoreSetting and if no setting found for store or no store is associated with the Order then from PartySetting (for vendorPartyId).
